column2: A letter has arrived from our Viceroy in Athesia. It seems that the Kingdom of Plantagenia has offered to purchase the peninsula from us. They have a great deal of money set aside for the purchase and our current financial and political situation makes us more inclined to accept.
Venice has agreed to our offer for Athesia! Not only have they agreed to the sale of the Athesian peninsula but they have also included the island chains of Eleuthera and Lucaya as well!
Despite their situation Venice has refused our offer to sell Athesia. We can either accept this or issue them an ultimatum

It seems that Plantagenia is not taking no for an answer. Now they have massed their soldiers at the Athesia border and there are rumors that their ships are planning for a long voyage. Perhaps now is the time to accept their demands?
Venice has reversed its prior decision and agreed to turn over Athesia! Venice bowing down to our show of force truly shows how far we've come as a great power!
Once again Venice has refused to hand over Athesia. They believe we won't follow through with our promise of war but let us show them how wrong they were.
Plantagenia has offered us a great sum of cash for the island of Cuba. While the island has served us well for centuries the Plantagenians have presented a great deal of money. What shall we do?
Spain has decided to accept our offer for Cuba. This is a great day for our nation as we begin to dominate the region.

Unfortunately Spain has refused our offer. Unlike with the Venetians a war with Spain would result in a severe drain of our finances making war for Cuba unwise. This setback will not keep us from continuing our rise as a great power, however.

Plantagenia has been expanding across the Caribbean and has now set its eyes on our colonial islands. The islands in recent years have become a rather financial drain on our economy but we also do not want to just bow down to a minor power.
Our domination of the Caribbean is almost complete. Now that we own the islands of Ayiti and Righavn all that remains is Eendrachtsland.
Scandinavia has refused our offer. While we are saddened by their decision we have gained much in the Caribbean to be thankful for as well.
Plantagenia has come to us offering to buy Eendrachtsland. While the island is largely useless to us it would showcase our power by refusing.
Burgundy has accepted our offer! We are now the only major power left in the Caribbean!
Burgundy has refused our offer. We find it no to be no loss however as we already retain a large control of the Caribbean.

column2: According to the Treaty of Patras we can ask the Republic for our full independence when we feel that we will survive on our own. Now the time has come to reconquer the Hellene Empire!
column3: D'après le traité de Patras, nous pouvons demander notre indépendance si la menace turque recède. Ce moment est venu.
column4: According to the Treaty of Patras we can ask the Republic for our full independence when we feel that we will survive on our own. Now the time has come to reconquer the Hellene Empire!

column2: The Ottomans are no longer capable of defending the Holy Cities! We will claim this title and our rulers will protect Mecca and Medina for the glory of Allah!
column3: Les Ottomans ne sont plus capables de défendre les villes saintes! Nous prendrons le titre de calife et nos rois protégerons la Mecque et Médine pour la plus grande gloire d'Allah!
column4: The Ottomans are no longer capable of defending the Holy Cities! We will claim this title and our rulers will protect Mecca and Medina for the glory of Allah!

column2: After the weakening of the Byzantine Empire and the Bulgarian Empire in the middle and late 13th century, most of the Albanian territory became part of the Serbian state. Firstly, as part of Rashka and later as part of Serbian Empire. The southern part was governed by the semi-independent, Serbian ruled Despotate of Epiros. Along with the Serbian ruled Albania, there was also an Albanian state, the Principality of Arbër, and later the Kingdom of Albania. Thanks to these undisputed historical facts, we can claim Albania as a part of the Greater South Slavic Empire.
column3: Après l'affaiblissement des empires byzantins et bulgares à la fin du 13° siècle, la majorité des territoires albanais furent intégrer à l'état serbe. Nous pouvons donc réclamer ces territoires comme partis intégrales de notre empire des slaves du sud!
column4: After the weakening of the Byzantine Empire and the Bulgarian Empire in the middle and late 13th century, most of the Albanian territory became part of the Serbian state. Along with the Serbian ruled Albania, there was also an Albanian state, the Principality of Arbër, and later the Kingdom of Albania. Thanks to these undisputed historical facts, we can claim Albania as a part of the Greater South Slavic Empire.

column2: The Bulgarians are South Slavs too! What would the United Yugoslavia be without even uniting all Yugoslavian countries and lands! Let them join our rising empire and be free.
column3: Les Bulgares sont des slaves du sud également! La Yougoslavie ne saurait être complète sans les intégrer. Ils rejoindrons notre empire et seront libres.
column4: The Bulgarians are South Slavs too! What would the United Yugoslavia be without even uniting all Yugoslavian countries and lands! Let them join our rising empire and be free.

column2: Our territories in Ingria and Karelia are hard to defend against the Scandinavian Empire. We must aquire the Finnich March to secure us from the treacherous attacks of the Scandinavians and maintain the Equilibrium of Winter Powers.
column3: Nos territoires d'Ingrie et de Carélie sont difficiles à défendre contre l'empire scandinave. Nous devons acquérir les marches finlandaises pour nous protéger contre les attaques traîtres des scandinaves et maintenir l'équilibre des puissances du nord.
column4: Our territories in Ingria and Karelia are hard to defend against the Scandinavian Empire. We must aquire the Finnich March to secure us from the treacherous attacks of the Scandinavians and maintain the Equilibrium of Winter Powers.

column2: The Tsardom of Serbia was a medieval empire in the Balkans that emerged from the medieval Serbian Kingdom in the 14th century and existed from 1346 to 1371. Stefan of Serbia became Emperor of Serbs and Greeks and ruled everything from Thessaloniki to Novi Sad. The empire died with the creator but its legacy lives on...
column3: L'ancien Empire Serbe au 14° siècle réunissait les serbes et les grecques de Thessalonique à Novi Sad sous le Tsar Stefan de Serbie. L'empire ne lui a pas survécu, mais son héritage persiste…

column2: For too long a time our legitimate rights on Livonia have been usurped by others, such as those Scandinavian barbarians. It is time to proclaim to the word that the Russian Empire will not leave those lands which rightfully belong to it be occupied by foreign invaders.
column3: Depuis trop longtemps nos droits légitimes sur la Livonie sont usurpés par d'autres, tel que ces barbares scandinaves. Il est temps de proclamer au monde que l'Empire russe ne laissera pas ces terres qui lui reviennent de droit être occupé par des envahisseurs étrangers.
column4: For too long a time our legitimate rights on Livonia have been usurped by others, such as those Scandinavian barbarians. It is time to proclaim to the word that the Russian Empire will not leave those lands which rightfully belong to it be occupied by foreign invaders.

column2: Starting as a group of refugees without resources in a foreign land, we have become a powerful nation, recognised today as a Great Power. We now can challenge the French tyrants that expelled us from our lands, et work toward reconquering them!
column3: D'une bande de réfugiés sans ressources en terre étrangère, nous sommes devenus une nation forte, reconnue aujourd'hui comme une Grande Puissance. Nous pouvons maintenant défier le tyran français qui nous chassa de nos terres, et travailler à leurs reconquêtes.
column4: Starting as a group of refugees without resources in a foreign land, we have become a powerful nation, recognised today as a Great Power. We now can challenge the French tyrants that expelled us from our lands, et work toward reconquering them!

column2: The Siberian plains were claimed by the Russian rulers since the times of Vladimir Atlasov and Danila Antsiferov. We have to keep our word.
column3: La Russie, puissante et fière, domine aujourd'hui le monde slave. Il est temps de porter nos efforts vers l'avenir de notre nation: les vastes étendues de la Sibérie, qui n'attendent que les colons russes pour les développer.
column4: The Siberian plains were claimed by the Russian rulers since the times of Vladimir Atlasov and Danila Antsiferov. We have to keep our word.

column2: We finally completed the conquest of classic Greece but we should push farther - to the City of Cities itself. Constantinopolis is the ultimate reward for the mighty Greece! But first we will have to isolate the vile Turks to force them to leave Europe once and forever...
column3: Nous avons reconquis la Grèce classique mais nous devrions aller plus loin - jusqu'à Constantinople elle-même, l'ultime récompense pour la puissance Grèce! Mais il nous faudra d'abord pousser les turques à quitter l'Europe…

column2: The Miranda's experiment failed. But with enough maneuvering we have managed to unify the former lands of the Northern Federation. Democracy is not the way. Will you accept the crown of the first Emperor in the Amerigas? Unify through power!
column3: La fin de la république et l'instauration d'une dictature étaient certes des décisions drastiques, mais elles ont porté leurs fruits. Les sympathies sécessionnistes ont refluées, et une transition pacifique à une union de républiques est maintenant possible. Mais certains proposent de déclarer notre président empereur comme chef d'état cérémoniel, avec le vrai pouvoir détenu par le parlement.
column4: Though the ending of Democracy in Gran Columbia and the creation of a dictatorship may have been a drastic move, it has ultimately been vindicated. Secessionist sentiment has been greatly reduced and a peaceful transition into a Union of Republics is now possible. However, some have argued that we should crown our President as an Emperor to serve as a nominal head of state (though actual power would remain with a Cabinet of Ministers), who can act as a tiebreaker, free from partisan politics.

column2: The struggle between Burgundy and Bohemia for dominance over the remains of the Holy Roman Empire and the German nations still rages on. But now, in the year $YEAR$, Germans are finally rising to face their oppressors. Representatives of all German principalities are meeting in $CAPITAL$ to hold a council challenging the status quo. Furthermore, they are demonstrating the popular desire for increased political and social freedom, democracy, and national unity within liberal principles.
column3: La lutte entre la Bourgogne et la Bohémie pour le control des restes du Saint Empire Romain et des nations allemandes continue. Mais aujourd'hui, en l'an $YEARS$, les allemands se réunissent enfin pour faire face à leurs oppresseurs. Des représentants de toutes les principautés allemandes se rendent à $CAPITALS$ pour siéger au sein du premier parlement allemand, défiant le statut quo. Ils revendiquent également un soutien populaire pour davantage de libertés politiques et sociales et pour l'unité de la nation guidée par des principes libéraux
column4: Der Kampf zwischen Burgund und Böhmen um die Vorherrschaft über die Überreste des Heiligen Römischen Reiches und der deutschen Staaten tobt noch. Aber jetzt, im Jahr $YEAR$, begehren die Deutschen schließlich auf gegen ihre Unterdrücker. Vertreter aller deutschen Fürstentümer sind in $CAPITAL$ zu einer Sitzung zusammengekommen um den Status quo zu überwinden. Darüber hinaus demonstrieren sie den Wunsch nach einer verstärkten politischen und sozialen Freiheit, Demokratie und nationaler Einheit innerhalb von liberalen Prinzipien.

column2: The German Assembly has offered the crown of a new German Empire to us! Three Hurrahs for Free Germany!
column3: Le Parlement Allemand nous offre la couronne d'un nouvel empire allemand! Trois hourras pour l'Allemagne Libre!
column4: Der deutsche Rat hat uns die Krone einen neuen Deutschen Reiches angeboten! Drei Hurras für ein Freies Deutschland!

column2: After centuries we can finally  shake off the yoke of foreign empires over German lands.  $MONARCHTITLE$, what do you order?
column3: Après des siècles sous la domination d'empires étrangers, nous avons enfin une occasion de nous libérer. $MONARCHTITLE$, qu'ordonnez-vous?
column4: Nach Jahrhunderten können wir endlich das Joch ausländischer Imperien über die deutschen Lande abschütteln. $MONARCHTITLE$, was verfügt ihr?

column2: $MONARCHTITLE$, the German fools believe they can unite in a nation of their own, under the ridiculous motto of "Liberty, Equality, Fraternity". Don't they know Germany is only a geographic expression?
column3: $MONARCHTITLE$, les idiots romantiques allemands pensent pouvoir s'unir en une nation, sous la ridicule devise "Liberté, Egalité, Fraternité". Ignorent ils que l'Allemagne n'est qu'une expression géographique?
column4: $MONARCHTITLE$, die deutschen Narren glauben sie könnten eine Nation aller Deutschen, unter dem lächerlichen Motto "Freiheit, Gleichheit, Brüderlichkeit" gründen. Wissen sie denn nicht, das Deutschland nur ein geographischer Ausdruck ist?

column2: Following the aspirations of the First German Council, representatives of the free German states are meeting in $CAPITAL$ to decide on the course to take. Rumours has it that they are the verge of deciding to offer the crown of a German Empire to the dynasty of a leading German state...
column3: Continuant les espoirs soulevés par le Premier Parlement Allemand, des représentants des états allemands libres se réunissent à $CAPITAL$ pour décider des actions à venir. Les rumeurs veulent qu'ils soient sur le point de décider de la dynastie à laquelle proposer la couronne d'un nouvel empire allemand...
column4: Im Anschluss an die Bestrebungen des Ersten Deutschen Rates, sind die Vertreter der freien deutschen Staaten in $CAPITAL$ zusammengekommen, um zu bestimmen welchen Weg man nehmen soll. Gerüchteweise heist es, dass sie kurz vor der Entscheidung stehen, die Krone eines neuen Deutschen Reiches der Dynastie eines führenden deutschen Staates anzubieten ...

column2: $MONARCHTITLE$, we have grave news for the stability of Europe: the King of Aragon has just been proclaimed king of a unified Aragon-Italy kingdom and moved his capital to Rome. His imperial fantasies are upsetting the balance of Europe, and his new court in Rome might even overshadow our own!
column3: $MONARCHTITLE$, nous avons des nouvelles préoccupantes: le roi d'Aragon vient de se faire proclamer roi d'un royaume unifié d'Aragon et d'Italie et déplace sa capitale à Rome! Ses fantasmes impériaux menacent l'équilibre des pouvoirs, et sa nouvelle cour romaine pourrait même faire de l'ombre à la notre!
column4: $MONARCHTITLE$, wir haben schlechte Neuigkeiten für Europas Stabilität: Der König von Aragon wurde eben zum König eines vereinten Königreiches von Aragon-Italien gekrönt, und er hat seine Hauptstadt nach Rom verlegt. Seine imperialen Fanatasien gefährden die Machtbalance Europas, und sein neuer Hof in Rom könnte sogar unseren eigenen in den Schatten stellen!

column2: As the Ottoman Empire grew in size and strength, Ottoman rulers beginning with Mehmet II began to claim caliphal authority. Their claim was strengthened when the Ottoman Empire defeated the Mamluk Sultanate in 1517 and took control of most Arab lands. The last Abbasid Caliph at Cairo, al-Mutawakkil III, was taken into custody and was transported to Istanbul, where he surrendered the Caliphate to Selim I.
column3: A mesure que l'empire ottoman grandissait en taille et puissance, les souverains ottomans commencèrent à prétendre à l'autorité califale. Leurs prétentions furent consolidés quand l'empire ottoman vaincu les Mamluks en 1517 et prit le contrôle des terres arabes. Le dernier calife abbasside au Caire, al-Mutawakkil III, fut fait prisonnier et emmené à Istanbul, où il renonça à son titre au profit de Selim I.
column4: As the Ottoman Empire grew in size and strength, Ottoman rulers beginning with Mehmet II began to claim caliphal authority. The last Abbasid Caliph at Cairo, al-Mutawakkil III, was taken into custody and was transported to Istanbul, where he surrendered the Caliphate to Selim I.

column2: $MONARCHTITLE$, Arabian fools are contesting your divine right to be the successor of Prophet Muhammad. It is forbidden for Muslims to have two Amirs for this would cause differences in their affairs and concepts, their unity would be divided and disputes would break out amongst them. The Sunnah would then be abandoned, the bida'a would spread and Fitna would grow, and that is in no one's interests. We should crush those daredevils!
column3: $MONARCHTITLE$, les illuminés arabes revendiquent votre titre de successeur du prophète Mahomet, la paix soit avec lui. Il est pourtant interdit aux musulmans d'avoir deux amîrs, car cela causerait des différences dans leurs concepts, l'unité du monde musulman serait brisée et ils se tourneraient les uns contre les autres. Mettons y un terme en écrasant ces illuminés!

column4: We have confirmed our claim to the title of the Protector of the Holy Cities. We shall hold this privilege forever!

column2: During the civil war between the Emperor and nobles, warlord Mikael Sehul declared that the Oromo branch of the Solomonic dynasty is the only and true and shall rule Ethiopia. The Oromo people all over Abyssinia, who have been recently persecuted by the Amhara rulers, now finally rise in their quest for independence and freedom...
column3: Pendant la guerre civile entre l'empereur et la noblesse, le chef de guerre Mikael Sehul avait déclaré que la branche oromo de la dynastie salomique est la seule a être légitime pour diriger l'Ethiopie. Les peuples oromos à travers l'Abyssinie, jusqu'à peu persécuté par les dirigeants Amhara, se soulèvent enfin dans leur quête pour l'indépendance!

column2: Now that the Ottomans look weak, the nationalist Greeks gained enough support in their Parliament to demand true independence based on the Treaty of Patras signed in 1827 by general Zimisces, Doge Visconti and emissaries of the Spanish Empire, Crown of Aragon and Dual Monarchy of France and England. What should we do?
column3: Maintenant que les Ottomans sont faibles, les grecques nationalistes ont assez de soutient dans leur parlement pour nous demander une vrai indépendance, comme promise par le traité de Patras de 1827 signé entre Venise et la Grèce. Que devrions nous faire?
column4: Now that the Ottomans look weak, the nationalist Greeks gained enough support in their Parliament to demand true independence based on the Treaty of Patras signed in 1827 by general Zimisces, Doge Visconti and emissaries of the Spanish Empire, Crown of Aragon and Dual Monarchy of France and England. column2: The Greeks have demanded independence from Venice but the Most Serene Republic refused, even though they signed the Treaty of Patras giving Greece the right to request it.
column3: Les grecs ont demandé leur indépendance à Venise, mais la Sérénissime a refusé, en contradiction avec le traité de Patras qu'ils avaient pourtant signé!
column4: The Greeks have demanded independence from Venice but the Most Serene Republic refused, even though they signed the Treaty of Patras giving Greece the right to request it.

column2: After 400 years, our position in the Imperial City of Istanbul has become too dangerous for government to stay there. We have to flee, my lord.
column3: Après quatre siècles, notre situation dans la ville impériale d'Istanbul est devenue trop précaire pour que le gouvernement puisse y rester. Nous devons partir…
column4: After 400 years, our position in the Imperial City of Istanbul has become too dangerous for government to stay there. We have to flee, my lord.

column2: The doors of the Palacio de las Garzas are finally opening. Today, the emissaries of all federal subjects of Gran Colombia finally came to the decision…but what will it be? Will the independentists triumph?
column3: Les portes du parlement s'ouvrent enfin. Aujourd'hui, les émissaires des états fédéraux de Grande Colombie ont enfin pris une décision… Mais qu'est ce? Les indépendantistes ont-ils triomphés?
column4: The doors to the Parliament are finally opening. Today, the emissars of all federal subjects of Gran Colombia finally came to the decision…but what will it be? Will the independentists triumph?

column2: After much deliberation, common ground was found and a new Constitution has been drafted, promising both liberty and unity to all citizens of Gran Colombia. It seems like the republic will endure, with the consent of its people!
column3: Après de long débats, un terrain d'entente a été trouvé et une nouvelle constitution écrite, promettant la liberté et l'unité à tous les citoyens de Grande Colombie. Il semblerait que la république survivra, avec le consentement du peuple!
column4: After much deliberation, common ground was found and a new Constitution has been drafted, promising both liberty and unity to all citizens of Gran Columbia. It seems like the republic will endure, with the consent of its people!

column2: Mutual distrust and resistance within the member states has foiled the attempt at crafting a common constitution. The representatives of Quito, Arequipa, Santandera, Castilla and Essequibo have reaffirmed their independence and stormed out of the Congress. We can accept the result and solidify our regime north of the Andagoya Isthmus, or reject it, establish a dictatorship and forcibly unify Gran Colombia.
column3: Les conflits entre les états membres ont fait échouer la tentative d'écriture d'une constitution commune. Les délégués du Pérou, de l'Equateur, de Santandera, du Venezuela et de Guyane ont réaffirmé leurs indépendance et claqué la porte du congrès. Nous pouvons accepter le résultat et solidifier notre république au nord de l'isthme de Panama, ou le rejeter, établir une dictature et maintenir la Grande Colombie par la force.
column4: Mutual distrust and resistance within the member states has foiled the attempt at crafting a common constitution. The representatives of Peru, Ecuador, Santandera, Venezuela and Guyana have reaffirmed their independence and stormed out of the Congress. We can accept the result and solidify our regime north of the Panama Isthmus, or reject it, establish a dictatorship and forcibly unify Gran Columbia.

column2: Despite the death of the 'Father of the Revolution', Simón Bolívar in 1830, his followers lead by Francisco de Miranda and Juan Manuel Santos continued fighting the Spanish colonial government and eventually banished the Spanish from the New World. But the Bolívar's dream of united Gran Colombia soon deteriorated into disputes over the distribution of powers. The self-declared provisional president de Miranda called representatives of all important factions to Andagoya, in one last desperate try to safe the unity of the newborn republic. Will he succeed?
column3: Malgré la débâcle militaire à la Havane en 1835"," le traité de Santiago de Cuba qui suivit garanti l'indépendance des nations de l'""""Alliance colombienne"""". En violation du traité", le Mexique, puissance dominante de l'alliance depuis la mort de Simon Bolivar et seul pays dont l'indépendance était reconnue avant la guerre, pris le contrôle total des autres états et établi la nation de Grande Colombie. Alors que la révolte gronde dans les autres états," le Président a appelé un congrès visant à établir une constitution nationale. Réussira-il?""
column4: Despite the disastrous Battle of Havana in 1835", the subsequent Treaty of Santiago de Cuba secured the independence of the nations of the 'Columbian Alliance'. Disregarding the legal independence of the other member states, Mexico, the dominant power within the Alliance following the death of Simon Bolivar (and the only state that was internationally recognized as independent before the treaty, seized total control, annexed the other states and established the nation of Gran Columbia. As resentment burns within the other states, the President has called a Congress with a view to establishing a National Constitution. Will it succeed?

column2: After days of debates, the representatives of the various provinces have been drawn together by their common desire for full sovereignty. Talks of a common constitution and state have collapsed. We can accept this, or establish a Dictatorship and enforce our rule.
column3: Après des jours de débats, les représentants des différents états sont d'accord sur leur désir commun d'indépendance complète. Les projets de constitution et république communes se sont effondrés. Nous pouvons l'accepter, ou instaurer une dictature et maintenir l'unité du pays par la force.
column4: After days of debates, the representatives of the various States have been drawn together by their common desire for full sovereignty. Talks of a common constitution and state have collapsed. We can accept this, or establish a Dictatorship and enforce our rule.

column2: The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. One of them was Chagatai. Many years have passed by and the only part of the Empire that survived was the Chagatai Khanate's successor - the Dzungar Khanate, the last heir to the Genghis's legacy. Today we completed the resurrection of the Empire under the green flag of Islam. Insha'Allah, let us rule China for ever!
column3: L'empire mongol fondé par le Grand Khan Temüjin fut partagé entres ses quatre fils à sa mort. L'un d'entre eux était Cagataï. Les années ont passé et la seule partie de l'empire à avoir survécu est le Khanat de Cagataï. Aujourd'hui nous refondons l'empire sous la bannière verte de l'islam. Incha'Allah, nous régnerons sur la China pour toujours!
column4: The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. One of them was Chagatai. Many years have passed by and the only part of the Empire that survived was the Khanate of Chagatai. Today we completed the resurrection of the Empire under the green flag of Islam. Inch 'Allah, let us rule China for ever!

column2: After centuries of warfare following the invasion of the accursed Manchus, we have managed to bring unity back to China. It is time to claim for good the Mandate of Heaven, and reunify the ancient Chinese nation!
column3: Après les siècles de guerre qui ont suivis les invasions Manchus, nous avons réussis à ramener l'unité à la Chine. Il est temps de reprendre le Mandat Céleste et de réunifier l'antique nation chinoise!
column4: After centuries of warfare following the invasion of the accursed Manchus, we have managed to bring unity back to China. It is time to claim for good the Mandate of Heaven, and reunify the ancient Chinese nation!

column2: The Qing dynasty that united our lands launched an invasion of China under the leadership of the Kanxi Emperor. But his triumph was incomplete, as the accursed Ming resisted our push to the south. Now we have finished what he started, and our dynasty shall rule China for centuries to come!
column3: La dynastie Qing qui unifia nos peuples lança une invasion de la Chine sous le commandement de l'empereur Kanxi. Mais son triomphe ne fut pas complet, les Ming repoussant notre invasion du sud. Maintenant nous terminons ce qu'il commença, et notre dynastie régnera sur la Chine pour les siècles à venir!
column4: The Qing dynasty that united our lands launched an invasion of China under the leadership of the Kanxi Emperor. But his triumph was incomplete, as the accursed Ming resisted our push to the south. Now we have finished what he started, and our dynasty shall rule China for centuries to come!

column2: The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. Our branch continued to rule China but the Chinese traitors overthrew the Yuan dynasty and we had to flee to the steppes and struggle. But today the Empire lives again!
column3: L'empire mongol fondé par le Grand Khan Temüjin fut partagé entres ses quatre fils à sa mort. L'un d'entre eux était Cagataï. Notre branche continua de régner sur la China jusqu'à ce que les traîtres chinois renversent la dynastie Yuan et nous forcent à fuir dans les steppes. Mais aujourd'hui nous refondons l'empire!
column4: The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. Our branch continued to rule China but the Chinese traitors overthrew the Yuan dynasty and we had to flee to the steppes and struggle. But today the Empire lives again!

column2: After centuries of isolation, we have returned to bring unity back to our motherland. Let us resurrect the glorious Chinese nation and move our capital back to the mainland!
column3: Après des siècles d'isolation, nous avons pu ramener l'unité à notre ancienne patrie. Refondons la glorieuse Chine et réinstallons y notre capitale!
column4: After centuries of isolation, we have returned to bring unity back to our motherland. Let us resurrect the glorious Chinese nation and move our capital back to the mainland!

column2: Centuries ago our kings led great invasions to the fractured China. We have finished what they started and now our rulers will govern China in eternal peace under the guidance of the Awakened One.
column3: Il y a des siècles nos rois menèrent de grandes invasions de la Chine divisée. Nous avons fini ce qu'ils commencèrent et désormais nos chefs gouverneront la Chine dans une paix éternelle grâce à la bénédiction de l'Eveillé
column4: Centuries ago our kings led great invasions to the fractured China. We have finished what they started and now our rulers will govern China in eternal peace under the guidance of the Awakened One.

column2: Greece was shattered and subdued many times and without us it would stay under the yoke of foreigners forever. But we have given independence to all Greeks! Let's celebrate this glorious moment!
column3: La Grèce fut brisée et conquise de nombreuses fois, et sans nous elle resterait sous le joug d'étrangers. Mais nous avons changé tout ça! Célébrons ce moment glorieux!
column4: Greece was shattered and subdued many times and without us it would stay under the yoke of foreigners forever. But we have given independence to all Greeks! Let's celebrate this glorious moment!

column2: Our domination of the German areas is now beyond contest - for the first time in a millennia, the German people are united under a flag, ours! Let us proclaim the Greater German state, and take our rightful place as leaders of Europe!
column3: Notre domination des terres germaniques est maintenant sans rival - pour la première fois depuis un millénaire, les allemands sont unis sous un seul drapeau - le nôtre! Proclamons le Grand Empire Allemand, et prenons notre place légitime à la tête de l'Europe!
column4: Unsere Dominanz der deutschen Gebiete ist nun über jeden Einspruch erhaben - zum ersten Mal in einen Jahrtausend ist das deutsche Volk unter einer Flagge vereint, unserer! Lasst uns Großdeutschland verkünden und unseren rechtmäßigen Platz als Führer von Europa einnehmen!

column2: From the Hindu Kush to the Ocean, along the mighty Ganges and Indus, let us reclaim the mantle of Asoka the Wise and the Great Moghols. Call it Bharat, Hindustan or simply India, today it is one land again!
column3: Des hauteurs de l'Hindu Kush à l'océan, le long des puissants Ganges et Indus, reprenons le flambeau du sage Ashoka et des grands Moghols. Qu'on l'appelle Bharat, Hindustan ou simplement Inde, aujourd'hui c'est un seul pays de nouveau!
column4: Vom Hindukusch bis zum Ozean, entlang des mächtigen Ganges und Indus, lasst uns in die Fußstapfen von Ashoka dem Weisen und dem grossen Mogulreich treten! Nennt es Bharat, Hindustan oder einfach Indien, heute ist es wieder ein vereintes Land!

column2: Our dominant position over the south and central German states is now firmly established. While it will still take time to unify all the Germans, today we can at last form a proper German kingdom - a stepping-stone to greater things!
column3: Notre position dominante parmi les états allemands du sud et du centre est maintenant fermement établie. Il faudra encore du temps avant de pouvoir unir tous les allemands, mais aujourd'hui nous pouvons enfin former un vrai état allemand - une étape avant de plus grandes choses!
column4: Unsere beherrschende Stellung über die Süd-und Mitteldeutschen Staaten ist inzwischen fest etabliert. Es wird zwar noch einige Zeit dauern, alle Deutschen zu vereinigen, doch können wir heute endlich ein deutsches Königreich gründen - ein Sprungbrett zu Höherem!

column2: We have now obtained a dominant position over the north German states - it is time to complete this, to better pursue the greater goal of German unity.
column3: Nous sommes désormais en position dominante parmi les états allemands du nord. Il est temps de le finaliser, pour pouvoir mieux poursuivre le grand but de l'unité allemande.
column4: Wir haben jetzt eine beherrschende Stellung in den norddeutschen Staaten erreicht - es ist Zeit dies zu vollenden, um besser das größere Ziel der deutschen Einheit zu erreichen.

column2: Our domination over the Eastern Slavs is complete, and the time has come to declare a single states of all the Russians. The Great Bear has finally risen, and now Europe shall fear us!
column3: Notre domination des slaves de l'est est complète, et l'heure est venue de créer un seul état pour tous les russes. L'Ours Russe s'est enfin réveillé, et maintenant l'Europe nous craindra!
column4: Unsere Herrschaft über die östlichen Slaven ist vollendet und die Zeit ist gekommen, um ein einzelnes Zarentum aller Russen zu erklären. Der große Bär ist endlich auferstanden, und jetzt wird Europa uns fürchten!

column2: Since the first conquest of Boer Republics by Burgundy and the Great Trek, our people dreamed about a free, united land. And now the dream has come true!
column3: Depuis les premières conquêtes des républiques boers par la Bourgogne et le Grand Trek qui suivit, notre peuple rêve d'un pays libre et unifié. Aujourd'hui le rêve prend forme!
column4: Seit der ersten Eroberung der Burenrepubliken von Burgund und dem Großen Treck, träumte unser Volk von einem freien, vereinten Land. Und nun ist dieser Traum wahr geworden!

column2: Ever since the end of the Great German War, the ideals of freedom and nationhood cherished by the German rebels seem buried. In England, Holland or Brandenburg, the authority of foreign kings is uncontested. But the calm over Europe since the end of the war is an illusion: throughout the continent, the beginnings of industrialisation, the spread of new knowledge and a growing discontent amongst the population hints at changes to come. In Arcadia and Ameriga, young powers are emerging to challenge those in the old world, and in supposedly sleeping Asia, old nations are reinventing themselves...
column3: Depuis la fin de la Grande Guerre Allemande, les idéaux de liberté et d'indépendance des révolutionnaires allemands semblent enterrés. En Angleterre, en Hollande ou dans le Brandebourg, l'autorité de rois étrangers est incontestée. Mais le calme qui règne sur l'Europe depuis la fin de la guerre est trompeur: à travers le continent, les débuts de l'industrialisation, la dissémination de nouveaux savoirs et une insatisfaction croissante parmi les populations augurent des changements à venir. En Amérique, de jeunes puissances émergent pour défier celles du vieux monde, et dans l'Asie réputée endormie, de veilles nations se réinventent...
column4: Ever since the end of the Great German War, the ideals of freedom and nationhood cherished by the German rebels seem buried. In America, young powers are emerging to challenge those in the old world, and in supposedly sleeping Asia, old nations are reinventing themselves...

column2: With the conquest of Persia, Khorasan and Mesopotamia, our great dynasty can now restore the Iranian Empire of Cyrus the Great. Long live the Shahanshah- the King of Kings!
column3: Avec la conquête de la Perse, du Khorasan, de la Transoxiane et de la Mésopotamie, notre grande dynastie peut maintenant restaurer l'empire de Cyrus le Grand. Long vie au Shahanshah - le Roi des Rois!
column4: With the conquest of Persia, Khorasan, Transoxiana and Mesopotamia, our great dynasty can now restore the Iranian Empire of Cyrus the Great. Long live the Shahanshah- the King of Kings!

column2: Alexander the Great, son of Philip, managed to conquer everything between Athens and far-away India. With our rise among the Great Powers of the world, we can start thinking about rebuilding it  - starting with the conquest of the Asia Minor.
column3: Alexandre le Grand réussit à conquérir toutes les terres entre Athènes et l'Inde lointaine. Maintenant que nous sommes reconnus comme une des Grandes Puissances de la planète, nous pouvons commencer à le reconstruire - à commencer par le conquête de l'Asie mineure.
column4: Alexander the Great, son of Philip, managed to conquer everything between Athens and far-away India. With our rise among the Great Powers of the world, we can start thinking about rebuilding it  - starting with the conquest of the Asia Minor.

Feudalism was a set of political and military customs.  Although derived from the Latin word feodum,  then in use, the term feudalism and the system it describes were not conceived of as a formal political system by the people living in the Medieval Period. In its classic definition, by François-Louis Ganshof (1944), feudalism describes a set of reciprocal legal and military obligations among the warrior nobility, revolving around the three key concepts of lords, vassals and fiefs. There is also a broader definition, as described by Marc Bloch (1939), that includes not only warrior nobility but the peasantry bonds of manorialism, sometimes referred to as a "feudal society". Because of multiple definitions and other issues, many now see the concept of feudalism as deprived of specific meaning, which has led in recent decades to many historians and political theorists rejecting feudalism as a useful way for understanding society.

In $YEAR$ the young Incan emperor Usco Inca became old enough to take power from his regent. His first action taken upon gaining power was to rename himself Pachacuti II after the legendary founder of the Empire. His next move was to adopt as many western technologies and political ideas as possible. He reformed the absolute Incan monarchy into a constitutional monarchy and began widespread building projects accross the empire. We have been blessed to have a king as great as Pachacuti and may he bring our great nation back to it's former Glory! All hail Pachacuti II!

One of the most lasting legacies of Pachacuti II was his massive overhaul of the Incan educational system. Before his reign education was handled almost exclusively by the parents. Literacy was almost non-existant. All knowledge was passed down through the quipu,which were a form of knotted strings. Though they took on many aspects of a writting system,by being able to indicate placenames for example,they were far more unwieldy than a book. Pachacuti worked with the Quipucamayocs,or those who knew how to read the quipu,"to transcribe all of the knowledge contained in the quipu into the new Quechua alphabet he had adopted. This knowledge was then used as the basis for the new madatory school system he adopted, along with western science and technological education.

Upon the start the Incan Emperor Pachacuti II's reign the Quechua people of Cuzco and Arequipa began agitating to rejoin the Inca Empire. After repeatedly being ignored they have entered into open revolt. As the Incans grow in power and prestige it will become increasingly difficult to hold onto the area as it contains their ancestral capital. It maybe adventagous to transfer the lands peacefully to the Inca, rather than waiting for them to come and take it themselves. On the other hand we could simply put down the rebellion, and the upstart Inca Empire itself and be done with it as they most likely incited the rebellion in the first place to further their own aims.

Proposals for a Canal across the Andagoya Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Sancho III of Navarre and Alfonso VII of León and Castile both took the title Imperator Totius Hispaniae, meaning "Emperor of All Hispania" centuries before. But with the rise of the Dual Monarchy in the East it was too dangerous for Castille to extend its territories and instead of the planned union with Aragon, the Kingdom of Hispania was created by merging the crowns of Castille and Portugal.
